sponsor: Wyeth is now a wholly owned subsidiary of Pfizer
briefTitle: Study to Evaluate a 13-valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine in Infants.
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Randomized, Active-Controlled, Double-blind Trial Evaluating the Safety, Tolerability, and Immunogenicity of a 13-valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine in Healthy Infants Given With Routine Pediatric Vaccinations in Spain
summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety, tolerability and immunogenicity of a 13-valent pneumococcal conjugate (13vPnC) vaccine compared to Prevenar (7vPnC), when given concomitantly with routine pediatric vaccinations in Spain.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Achieving Predefined Meningococcal C Serum Bactericidal Assay (SBA) Titer of â‰¥ 1:8, and a Predefined Antibody Level for Diphtheria in 13vPnC Group Relative to 7vPnC Group After 2-doses of the Infant Series
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: One month after 2-doses of the infant series (5 months of age)
